name: Long Way Home (NotJoseph, MandoQueer, dch789, nikcy, lsy980715)
name_original: Long Way Home (NotJoseph, MandoQueer, dch789, nikcy, lsy980715)
description:
Game Description

Long Way Home is one of the 4 games that we have to make for this game jam. This Game is a 3D Puzzle game to clear every level to go back home. This game is a part of the game jam with Genre Verbs. These unique Genre Verbs, Neglect and 3D Puzzler, are main mechanics and important Verb to making the progression.


Long Way Home is a short 3D puzzle  game, created for the DATT 4300 game jam. How To Play Members

Nicky Schubert
Joseph Yong
Daniel Hayward
Daniel Rios
Soo Lee
